The most toxic community I have ever seen in any game in my 15+ years of gaming. So many bugs, glitches, and the amount of times I have encountered lag with the servers is insane. Most of my friends find this game extremely boring and the absolute worst, and while I would consider it as trash, it is MY beloved trash. I love this game with all my heart and would still recommend it for others.

Great game overall. Very fun, and with the exception of some bugs that you learn to deal with, they're not enough to make me want to play something else. Devs constantly add new content and do their best to keep it fun for both survivors and killers. Game is sick, run it!
